contextInfo.title: Add a Course or Book to a Teaching Group

content.code:
To add a course or book to a Teaching Group:

  1. Select your Group from the list on the left hand side of the screen.
  2. Click the drop down arrow next to the name of your group (at the top of the right hand panel).
  3. Select Add a Course to this Teaching Group.
  4. Tick the box next to the name of the course you wish to add this Group to.
  5. Click the Add button.
